item.title: Episode 57: .NET and Podcasting - with Jamie Taylor
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by the host of The Modern .NET Show, Jamie Taylor to chat about both .NET and podcasting! We also chatted about various other things like productivity, remote working and life balance, supporting junior developers, and plenty more! Jamie Taylor is the lead developer, CTO, and Microsoft MVP for developer technologies at RJJ Software. As a seasoned professional with 14 years of experience, Jamie brings expertise in .
